entry.title: The Machine Learning Race Is Really a Data Race
entry.quote: Organizations that hope to make AI a differentiator need to draw from alternative data sets — ones they may have to create themselves.

entry.title: The China Issue
entry.quote: Genes, chips, qbits, rockets, reactors, surveillance and sand - the tools of a rising superpower

entry.title: Best Data Visualization Projects of 2018
entry.quote: visualization that matured over the years and developed into a medium rather than a form of commercial eye candy. There’s less focus on visualization the tool and more focus on how to use the tools. That’s a good thing.

entry.title: The 10 most intriguing inventions of 2018
entry.quote: From programmable pills to power-generating boots, here are some of the most unusual technological innovations we covered this year.
